API_Description: Allows a script to show or hide both the horizontal and vertical Acrobat toolbars of Acrobat 9 or earlier. In Acrobat X, allows a script to show or hide the Plugin Addon Tools panel on the right side of the display area. It does not hide the toolbar (Acrobat 9 or earlier) or the tools panel (Acrobat X), in external windows (that is, in an Acrobat window within a web browser).
Examples:
Example: Hide the toolbar.

```
app.toolbar = false;
```
